Name: site
Description: name of the forest site, BB, GR = Griffy, DUG = Dugdale, CH = Cicada Hill, DUB = Dubois, HQ = Headquarters, SR45 = State Route 45, DUCK = Duckworth Road, TC = T.C. Steele, LD = Lilley-Dickey, FR = Forest Road, PR = Parker Road

Name: age
Description: young (<40 years) or mature (>60 years) forest

Name: ppfd
Description: photosynthetic photon flux density (micro-mol per square meter per second)

Name: pct_light
Description: percent of available light relative to open sun conditions
